definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: Young heirs to future-hold, city grows more radiant.
sentences.chinese: 青年累代承未来，城市连年添华彩。

sentences.english: A lot of foreign sugar has been imported in recent years, but it has not solved the problem.
sentences.chinese: 连年来又大量进口外国糖，仍不能解决问题。

sentences.english: In Junan county, the yield of summer sowing peanut (Arachis hypogaea L. ) under plastic-film-covered cultivation was high and stable in successive years.
sentences.chinese: 莒南县夏花生地膜覆盖栽培连年获得高产稳产。

sentences.english: In Junan county, the yield of summer sowing peanut (Arachis hypogaea L. )
sentences.chinese: 莒南县夏花生地膜覆盖栽培连年获得高产稳产。

sentences.english: We are going to bring the years of ever-rising borrowing to an end.
sentences.chinese: 我们要结束连年来持续增加的贷款。

sentences.english: In recent years metal casting production of China has been increased continuously.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，中国金属铸件生产连年增长。

sentences.english: Years of deprivation had broken a centuries-old bond between Cambodia's people and nature.
sentences.chinese: 连年的贫穷破坏了千百年来柬埔寨人与大自然的纽带。

sentences.english: In recent years, teachers' salaries have fallen behind those of other non-manual workers.
sentences.chinese: 连年来，西席的薪水已经落伍于其他非体力劳动者了。

sentences.english: The percentage of students entering a higher school against the total number of students.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校连年保持了较高的升学率。

sentences.english: Nowadays the rear service problem is serious with the year-after-year enlargement of college enrollment.
sentences.chinese: 随着高校的连年扩招，后期工作的问题相当严重。

sentences.english: China's soccer team, by contrast, is a perennial disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 相比较而言，中国国足却叫中国人连年失望。

sentences.english: This follows years of war and neglect by the Sudanese government in Khartoum.
sentences.chinese: 这一结果源于连年内战和北苏丹政府的渎职。

sentences.english: He says Darjeeling's tea industry has been in decline for years.
sentences.chinese: 班内吉表示，大吉岭的茶叶生意连年下降。

sentences.english: After years of war and chaos the people urgently needed rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 人民于连年战乱之后，已亟待休养生息。

sentences.english: Comedy movies have been successful for years, but they are one of the hardest scripts to write.
sentences.chinese: 喜剧电影连年来都很成功，但却是最难写的剧本之一。

sentences.english: With the development of tourism, tourists to Mount Wudang Jinding successive incremental.
sentences.chinese: 随着旅游事业的发展，来武当山金顶的游客连年递增。

definition: the people's livelihood is reduced to destitution (idiom); a time of famine and impoverishment
The people have no way to make a living (idiom, from Record of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4])/no way of getting by
the last few years/last several years/recent years
